title: About Us
content:
She was born July 3, 2003, native of Gaston County, the daughter of Curtis Von Nelson and Cheryl De-Marques, of Gastonia.
Aliyah was a student at Holbrook Middle School in Lowell.
In addition to her parents, she is survived by: sister, Israel Nelson, of Gastonia; grandmother, Marla Whelchel, of Salina, Kansas; aunts, Kari Nelson and Jason Goldman, of Lawrence, Kan.; Kimberly and Mario Anest, of Texas; Crystal and Karl Pentz, of Cramerton; uncles, Christopher DeMarques and Keith Dunn, both of Gastonia.
She was preceded in death by: grandfathers, William Nelson and Charles DeMarques; grandmother, Wanda Taggart and cousin, Logan Pentz.
A memorial service will be held 7 p.m. Monday, Sept. 22, 2014, at Bethlehem Church, 3100 Bethlehem Church St., Gastonia. Visitation will be 6 to 7 p.m. on Monday prior to the service at the church.
In lieu of flowers, memorials may be made to Gaston Humane Society - P.O. Box 2334, Gastonia, NC 28053-2334.
Arrangements are with the South Chapel of Greene Funeral Service and Crematorium, Gastonia.
A guest book is available to sign online at www.GreeneFuneral.com.
